Text: Some info. This was shot entirely in Color and then converted to Black and White. There is NO Audio except for a couple of screams, moans, and possibly laughter. Oh and Tom Six is already working on a Third one. Quote: "The third film will make the last one look like a Disney film. We're going to shoot the third film entirely in America, and it's going to be my favourite... It's going to upset a lot of people." So expect The Human Centipede 3 (Final Sequence).
